action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Hashem, Ichiyama, Poepoe; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti, Lamosao, Morikawa, Souza; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Shimizu; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Woodson.
